original_text: His offering was one silver charger of the weight of an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:
korean_text: 그의 헌물도 성소의 세겔로 백삼십 세겔 무게의 은 쟁반 하나와 칠십 세겔 무게의 은 바리 하나라 이 두 그릇에는 소제물로 기름 섞은 고운 가루를 채웠고

sentences.original_text: His offering was one silver charger
of the weight of an hundred and thirty shekels
one silver bowl of seventy shekels
after the shekel of the sanctuary
both of them full of fine flour
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘은 고운 가루로 가득 채워져 있었고

sentences.original_text: mingled with oil for a meat offering
